0: In a groundbreaking scientific achievement, researchers have successfully developed a new form of renewable energy. This innovative technology harnesses the power of ocean waves to generate electricity. By capturing the kinetic energy from waves, scientists can now provide a sustainable and eco-friendly energy source. This advancement has the potential to reduce our reliance on fossil fuels and decrease greenhouse gas emissions significantly.
